tag_list: raising-funds, innovation, revenue-generation, woman-founder, mobile, productivity, semantics
overview: Kristen is currently co-founder of Meshin, a mobile personal productivity application that uses semantic technology to bring intelligence to your calendar. She has successfully raised seed funds from Xerox to incubate Meshin insides PARC, and is focused on continued fund raising, and building the Meshin brand and customer market. She co-leads the small team, which uses local and international resources, to support the Meshin app. roadmap and partnerships.
